response.answer_text: The global mega event will now run from 1 October 2021 to 31 March 2022, a delay that allows all participants to safely navigate the impact of COVID-19, and allows the World Expo to focus on a collective desire for new thinking to identify solutions to some of the greatest challenges of our time.

YES Dubai Expo is happening, but with a new date. NEW EXPO 2020 DATES ANNOUNCED 1 October 2021 – 31 March 2022 The event has been postponed to next year. Mark my words It will be a tremendous success.
